tasks.label: ios: build native target to validate logs compile
tasks.command: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; if command -v xcpretty >/dev/null; then pipe=xcpretty; else pipe=cat; fi; cd ios; xcodebuild -workspace exponotificationsinteractionsasync.xcworkspace -scheme exponotificationsinteractionsasync -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -arch x86_64 -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15" build | $pipe'
